meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating mielies with butter.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow mielies in the fields.
meanings.sent3: The mielie danced in the pot as it cooked.
meanings.sent4: The golden mielie stood out among the vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The smell of roasted mielies filled the air at the fair.

meanings.sent1: The mielie plant swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The farmer tended to the mielie crop.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit hid behind the tall mielie leaves.
meanings.sent4: The field of mielies whispered in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The bright green mielie field stretched to the horizon.

meanings.sent1: I found a mielie in my soup.
meanings.sent2: The chef added mielies to the stew.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a mielie from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The tiny mielie popped in the hot oil.
meanings.sent5: The golden mielie shone in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The mielie cob was grilled to perfection.
meanings.sent2: She roasted the mielie cob over the fire.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon stole the mielie cob from the campsite.
meanings.sent4: The juicy mielie cob dripped with butter.
